General.Name: Mulia Boga Raya PT
General.Description: PT Mulia Boga Raya Tbk produces and sells cheese and mayonnaise for salad dressing under the Prochiz brand name in Indonesia. It offers block and sliced cheese, and other products. The company sells its products through a network of distributors. It also exports its products. The company was incorporated in 2006 and is based in Bekasi, Indonesia. PT Mulia Boga Raya Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Garudafood Putra Putri Jaya Tbk.
General.Address: Kawasan Bekasi International Ind Estate, Bekasi, Indonesia
